value.title: StarCraft 2: Reynor's TERRAN vs MaxPax! (Best-of-3)
value.excerpt: Best-of-3 series of professional StarCraft 2 between Reynor as Terran and MaxPax as Protoss. Reynor is normally a Zerg in SC2, but he apparently decided to sign up to this ESL Open Cup with Terran instead. value.title: StarCraft 2: Serral MASSES ULTRALISKS vs Zest?! (Zerg vs Protoss)
value.excerpt: Professional match of StarCraft 2 between Serral and Zest. In this match Zest opens up with what looks like a standard turtle Sky Toss style. However, as he transitions towards a lot of Gateways, Serral is forced to respond and decides to go for Ultralisks. Ultras versus Protoss are incredibly uncommon.
